description: From the City of Melbourne’s Census of Land Use and Employment (CLUE), total employment (number of all jobs including full time, part time, casual and contract) in the municipality, categorised by industry and census year.

metadata.description: From the City of Melbourne's Census of Land Use and Employment (CLUE), total employment (number of all jobs including full time, part time, casual and contract) in the municipality, categorised by industry and census year.

name: Total Employment - By Industry - 2002 to 2012
